name: Curvy-Fit Slimming Bootcut Pants, Regular, Short, & Long Lengths
description: Built for a smaller waist and fuller thighs, these pants are perfect for women who usually have gaping at the waistband. No need to dry clean, either. The wrinkle-resistant fabric lets you wash, wear and go. Try the long- or regular-length inseam with heels for polished, professional feel, or pair the shorter inseam with flats for a more casual look.
50% Polyester, 50% Spandex

name: Regular and Short Length Studded Pull-On Tummy Control Pants
description: Every woman needs black pants to wear to the office or out for dinner.
